mapper.sql: id, job_no, `password`, mobile_no, user_name, head_img_url, scheduling, online_status, operate_user_id, operate_time, organization_id
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from tb_user
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_user (job_no, `password`, mobile_no, user_name, head_img_url, scheduling, online_status, operate_user_id, operate_time, organization_id) values (#{jobNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobileNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{headImgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{scheduling,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{onlineStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{operateUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{organizationId,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into tb_user
job_no,
`password`,
mobile_no,
user_name,
head_img_url,
scheduling,
online_status,
operate_user_id,
operate_time,
organization_id,

mapper.update:
update tb_user
id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
job_no = #{record.jobNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`password` = #{record.password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobile_no = #{record.mobileNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_name = #{record.userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
head_img_url = #{record.headImgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
scheduling = #{record.scheduling,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
online_status = #{record.onlineStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
operate_user_id = #{record.operateUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
operate_time = #{record.operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
organization_id = #{record.organizationId,jdbcType=INTEGER},

update tb_user set id = #{record.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, job_no = #{record.jobNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `password` = #{record.password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile_no = #{record.mobileNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_name = #{record.userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, head_img_url = #{record.headImgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, scheduling = #{record.scheduling,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, online_status = #{record.onlineStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, operate_user_id = #{record.operateUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, operate_time = #{record.operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, organization_id = #{record.organizationId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_user
job_no = #{jobNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`password` = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobile_no = #{mobileNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
head_img_url = #{headImgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
scheduling = #{scheduling,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
online_status = #{onlineStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT},
operate_user_id = #{operateUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
operate_time = #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
organization_id = #{organizationId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_user set job_no = #{jobNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `password` = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile_no = #{mobileNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, head_img_url = #{headImgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, scheduling = #{scheduling,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, online_status = #{onlineStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, operate_user_id = #{operateUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, operate_time = #{operateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, organization_id = #{organizationId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select a.id, a.job_no, a.mobile_no, a.user_name, a.head_img_url, a.scheduling, a.online_status, a.organization_id from tb_user a left join tb_user_vehicle b on a.id = b.user_id where b.vehicle_id = #{vehicleId}
